name: Anamnesis - Demo
description:
Crystal Cryptography

A demo of a First-Person Walker by Tromlui, aka Sarah Doherty Granoff.

The main character of Anamnesis begins the game with no identity in a mysterious, dream-like crystal cave. This character must navigate the chambers of the cave to find clues about his past lives, and ultimately his true name. If he does not succeed in this, he will never wake from this dream.

Anamnesis is a student project solely developed by Sarah Doherty Granoff, currently enrolled at the New York Film Academy in the One-Year Game Design Conservatory.

Warning: Graphics intensive. May run slowly on older computers.
